document.full_text: when a multiethnic french soccer team won the world cup in 1998, the nation celebrated as one, elevated above race and politics. so how did things suddenly turn so ugly?
document.title: on soccer: how racial politics reared its head
lines_and_colors: when a multiethnic french soccer team won the world cup in 1998, the nation celebrated as one, elevated above race and politics. so how did things suddenly turn so ugly?
